question: Name two notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania.
true_answer: Galvė Lake and Lukos Lake (also known as Bernardinų Lake).
asked_question_translated: Citez deux lacs remarquables entourant Trakai, en Lituanie.
answer: Les deux lacs remarquables entourant Trakai sont le lac Galvė et le lac Totoriškės.
answer_translated_eng: The two outstanding lakes surrounding Trakai are Lake Galvė and Lake Totoriškės.
